item.description:
What more is there to say??? We meet to eat and play a few rounds of pool. A very laid-back, just be yourself kind of evening.

Here's what the The Boston Phoenix's Best 2010 Readers' Picks has to say about Flat Top Johnny's

Weekends are pretty busy at FTJs, so we have 3 pool tables reserved for 3 hours (7-10pm) to accommodate up to 20 people MAX. I'll get there a little early to make sure we also have tables and/or booths for people not playing pool or waiting for their turn.

Because we're limiting the number of people who can participate, I'll turn off "Maybe" RSVPs 3 days before the event. Please confirm your spot as soon as you can or give up your space so someone else can join us. There will be more events like this in the future.

What doesn't matter:
  • you haven't played pool in, like, forever!
  • you suck at pool
  • you're a vegetarian ...


Just come to hang-out and have fun! Or, you can take a quickie lesson.

See you at Flat Top Johnny's!!!





EVENT FAQs

Is there a cover charge?
No
Is there a minimum I need to spend on food, drinks?
No
How long can we stay?
The event is 3 hours, from 7-10pm ... but ... you can stay as long as you want. FTJs closes at 1am on Saturdays.
What about the weather?
This event runs rain or shine!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Inquisitive Minds signs on our tables
item.name: Pool and burgers at Flat Top Johnny's (Kendall Sq)
